verbose_text: Similarly, RT-PCR and western blotting indicated that the mRNA and protein expression of survivin in PBMCs was significantly higher in patients with good collateral circulation (C2 + C3) than that in patients with no collateral flow (C0) (P < 0.05), although no significant differences were observed between C2 and C3 patients (P> 0.05) (XREF_FIG).
